wikipedia_page.main: Charles Montague Sawyer (20 March 1856 – 30 March 1921) was an English cricketer, and rugby union footballer who played in the 1880s and early 1890s. He played representative level cricket for Lancashire, Gentlemen of Lancashire, and at club level for Broughton Cricket Club [1], and representative level rugby union (RU) for England, and at club level for Broughton RUFC and  Southport RFC, as a Three-quarters, e.g. Wing, or Centre.

response: *Charles Sawyer (sportsman) (1856–1921),  English cricketer and rugby union footballer
